text: Gordon Clifford Grant (March 2, 1866 – July 22, 1928) was a Canadian politician. He served in the Legislative Assembly of New Brunswick as member of the Conservative party representing York County from 1925 to 1928. ==References== Category:20th-century Canadian politicians Category:1866 births Category:1928 deaths Category:Progressive Conservative Party of New Brunswick MLAs
title: G. C. Grant
